mapper.insert: insert into TOM_EXAM_SCORE (EXAM_ID, EMP_NAME, CODE, GRADE_STATE, EXAM_COUNT, TOTAL_POINTS, EXAM_TOTAL_TIME, CREATE_TIME, RIGHT_NUMBE, WRONG_NUMBER, ACCURACY) values (#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gradeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{examTotalTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rightNumbe,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{wrongNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{accuracy,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into TOM_EXAM_SCORE
EXAM_ID,
EMP_NAME,
CODE,
GRADE_STATE,
EXAM_COUNT,
TOTAL_POINTS,
EXAM_TOTAL_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
RIGHT_NUMBE,
WRONG_NUMBER,
ACCURACY,
#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gradeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{examCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{totalPoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{examTotalTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{rightNumbe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{wrongNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{accuracy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.select: select count(*) from TOM_EXAM_SCORE a,(select CODE,MAX(CREATE_TIME) m from TOM_EXAM_SCORE WHERE EXAM_ID= #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and GRADE_STATE!='D' GROUP BY CODE) b where a.code= b.CODE and a.CREATE_TIME=b.m and a.GRADE_STATE!='D' and EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.update:
update TOM_EXAM_SCORE
EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMP_NAME=#{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_STATE=#{gradeState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXAM_COUNT=#{examCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TOTAL_POINTS=#{totalPoints,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXAM_TOTAL_TIME=#{examTotalTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RIGHT_NUMBE=#{rightNumbe,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WRONG_NUMBER=#{wrongNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCURACY=#{accuracy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
where EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CODE=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from TOM_EXAM_SCORE where
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from TOM_EXAM_SCORE where GRADE_STATE='D'

select a.* from TOM_EXAM_SCORE a, (select max(total_points) m from TOM_EXAM_SCORE WHERE EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) b where a.total_points=b.m and a.EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and a.code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.* from tom_exam_score t where t.exam_id=#{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from TOM_EXAM_SCORE where GRADE_STATE!='P' and EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select max(EXAM_COUNT) from TOM_EXAM_SCORE where EXAM_ID=#{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM tom_exam_score WHERE EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND CODE= #{code,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and grade_state='Y'

SELECT a.`CODE` AS code,a.`NAME` AS name,a.ORGNAME AS orgName,a.ONEDEPTNAME AS oneDeptName,a.TWO_DEPT_NAME AS twoDeptName, a.THREE_DEPT_NAME AS threeDeptName,a.JOBNAME AS jobName,a.SECRET_EMAIL AS secretEmail, c.ACTIVITY_NAME AS theActivityName,c.ACTIVITY_NUMBER AS activityNumber,c.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,c.NEED_APPLY AS isRequired, c.NEED_APPLY AS needApply,c.APPLICATION_START_TIME AS applicationStartTime,c.ACTIVITY_START_TIME AS activityStartTime, c.ACTIVITY_END_TIME AS activityEndTime,c.PROTOCOL_START_TIME AS protocolStartTime, e.EXAM_ID AS examId,e.EXAM_NAME AS examName,e.EXAM_NUMBER AS examNumber, f.parent_project_classify_name AS parentProjectClassifyName, g.PASS_EB AS passEb FROM tom_emp a LEFT JOIN tom_activity_emps_relation b ON a.`CODE`=b.`CODE` LEFT JOIN tom_activity c ON b.ACTIVITY_ID=c.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN tom_activity_property d ON c.ACTIVITY_ID=d.ACTIVITY_ID LEFT JOIN tom_exam e ON d.EXAM_ID=e.EXAM_ID LEFT JOIN tom_project_resource f ON c.ACTIVITY_ID=f.resource_id LEFT JOIN tom_exam_paper g ON e.EXAM_PAPER_ID=g.EXAM_PAPER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND b.`STATUS`='Y' AND d.EXAM_ID IS NOT NULL AND f.`status`='Y' AND f.type='A'
SELECT COUNT(a.EXAM_ID) FROM tom_exam_score a WHERE a.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND a.GRADE_STATE='Y'
SELECT COUNT(a.EXAM_ID) FROM tom_exam_score a WHERE a.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.EXAM_ID = #{examId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND a.GRADE_STATE='Y'
